Entries.spring.004: Birthdays weren't really important when I was in the army.$0#$b#But I guess that's over now. It's my first birthday since I got back... so I'm gonna enjoy it.$1

Heh... it's nice to feel appreciated like this. I guess getting old isn't too bad.$h#$b#Who cares that I'm {{OmegaFallon.ThisTooShallPassCS/KentAge}}? That just means I have to enjoy the birthdays I have left.$1
Vincent still gets excited for dad's birthday every year. It's really cute, honestly.$1
How's the cake, dad? Mind if I taste test it?$1

Entries.spring.007: I absolutely couldn't spend my birthday in better company.$1#$b#Being {{OmegaFallon.ThisTooShallPassCS/LewisAge}} feels pretty good when you put it that way, heh.$h
Happy {{LewisAgeOrdinal}} birthday, Lewis! Here's a toast to many more just like it.$1

Entries.spring.010: Oh, heck yeah! Pink cake and cranberry candy!$l
Entries.spring.110: C'mon, Penny, can't we do something more fun than this?$0#$b#Today's my birthday! Loosen up a little!$1
Heh... if Penny were here, she'd probably be bugging me about doing my reading instead of eating cake!$1

Entries.spring.020: Did you help Marnie cook, Jas?$0#$b#Heh... ever thought about becoming a chef? I think you'd be great at it.$1

Entries.summer.114: Today's my birthday, Vincent, so you're gonna play with me whether you like it or not.$4
Heya, Vincy... got a birthday gift for me?$l
Mmm... I think I'll play with my old dolls today. Vincent would've liked that.$4
C'mon, Jas, the water isn't gonna kill ya! Hop in!$1
Entries.summer.115: Snails like to come out on rainy days...$0#$b#Let's go catch some, Jas! Don't chicken out on me!$1
Snails like to come out on rainy days...$0#$b#I'll go catch some for Jas.$1

Entries.summer.004: Jas, I have a gift for you.$0#$b#It's a figurine of one of those girls from that anime you like! I can't remember her name... hope you like it, though!$1

Entries.summer.113: Haley, you should come to my house later.$0#$b#I'm gonna make a batch of my grandma's cookies.$1

Entries.summer.017: Do you like the pizza, Sam?$0#$b#You'd better! I put a lot of work into it!$1

Entries.summer.024: Heh... now *that's* how to catch a good sturgeon, if I do say so myself.$1

Entries.fall.113: Hey, @.$0#$b#Today's my birthday so Sebastian came to play Journey of the Prairie King with me.$1
Hey, @.$0#$b#Today's my birthday so Sam came to play Journey of the Prairie King with me.$1
Hey, @.$0#$b#Today's my birthday I'm gonna reminisce and play Journey of the Prairie King.$1

Entries.fall.013: Abigail, you should have invited Sam to have dinner with us.$0#$b#I made too much spicy eel.$0
Abigail, you should have invited Sebastian to have dinner with us.$0#$b#I made too much spicy eel.$0
Abigail, you should have invited someone else to have dinner with us.$0#$b#I made too much spicy eel.$0

Entries.fall.118: I'm going to have dinner with Shane and Jas tonight, but tomorrow I'm going to have a drink at the saloon in Lewis' honor.$1

Entries.fall.018: Don't forget to make a wish, Aunt Marnie. You're never too old for that!$1

Entries.winter.007: Oh, Pierre, my sweet summer spangle...
Entries.winter.117: Hello, @.$0#$b#Just having some tea.$0#$b#Do you want to join?$1

Entries.winter.020: Such beautiful flowers... I hope Evelyn can admire them.$1
It's nice to come here and look back on the old times. I'll never forget Evelyn.$1

Entries.winter.023: I'm gonna order the finest wine today. That's what Elliott would've wanted.$0
Hello, @.$0#$b#I'm just having a little celebration in Leah's honor; it's her birthday today. You're welcome to join.$0
